text:
Mean connectome for the compared connectivity measures are plotted twice: With default `display_mode` and with `display_mode='lzry'`.
This seems useless for me since hemispheric saggital display mode vs default display mode is already demoed for connectome plotting in `/auto_examples/03_connectivity/plot_adhd_spheres.py`
title: no need for two display_mode choices in plot_connectivity_measures example
clean_text: mean connectom compar connect measur plot twice with default thi seem useless sinc hemispher saggit display mode vs default display mode alreadi demo connectom plot

title: no need for two display_mode choices in plot_connectivity_measures example
